text: David Shukuru Nshimirimana (born 2 January 1993) is a Burundian footballer who plays as a centre back for Zambian club Buildcon and the Burundi national team. ==Club career== In March 2019, Nshimirimana joined Zambia Super League club Buildcon from Rwandan club Mukura Victory Sports. ==International career== Nshimirimana made his international debut in 2014. Nshimirimana was included in Burundi's squad for the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations, and appeared in Burundi's 1–0 defeat to Nigeria. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Burundian footballers Category:People from Bujumbura Category:Association football defenders Category:Vital'O F.C. players Category:Burundi international footballers Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Burundian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Rwanda Category:Burundian expatriate sportspeople in Rwanda Category:Expatriate footballers in Zambia Category:Burundian expatriate sportspeople in Zambia Category:Buildcon F.C. players
title: David Nshimirimana
